thread.title: United Jet Makes Emergency Landing Over Mechanical Issue

author: senh
title: United Jet Makes Emergency Landing Over Mechanical Issue
text: BING NEWS: United Airlines Jet Makes Emergency Landing Over Mechanical Issue A United Airlines bound for Los Angeles declared a "midair emergency" and returned to London due to a mechanical issue Friday. Flight UA935 landed at Heathrow Airport at 12:33 p.m. local time (7:33 a.m. ET).
